Title: NSF CAREER Project
Body: Date: Tuesday, 26-Nov-96 00:09:46 GMT Server: NCSA/1.3 MIME-version: 1.0 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Wednesday, 20-Sep-95 22:45:59 GMT Content-length: 2987 NSF CAREER Project Principal Investigator: Dr. Edwin Sha NSF CAREER Award (1995 -  1998) Grant Number: MIP-9501006 Title: High-Level Design Methodologies for Time-Optimal and Memory-Optimal Systems Abstract: Since most time and memory critical parts of scientific computing applications are usually concentrated in nested loops, this research focuses on optimization algorithms for synthesis of those multi-level loops.
